dict.string: centromereStd 7.68e-8, E = 2 corresponds to PL = 50nm loop_radius = 0.44372 unbindTime 160/14100 unbindTimeVar 60/14100 Two typical parameter set: fast JT 2e-6 ER 3; slow JT 1e-5 ER 1.5 Extrusion rate varies from 60bp/s to 1500bp/s, in simulation judge time varies from 1.4e-6 to 3.5e-5 5e-3 refers to adding 30 condensins judgeTIme 3.94e-5 on average; extrusionRatePwr 1.5; unbindTime 160/14100; unbindTimeVar 60/14100;
